column2: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] catches eyes with you at court, later [FromFrom.GetSheHe] finds you alone and tells you how beautiful you are
Hmm? You aren't so bad yourself
[From.GetFirstName], has responded to your advances and accepted you as a lover.
Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is just fickle? I can try again later.
[From.GetFirstName] How can you do this to me, don't you know I love you??
You walk into court to the murmurs of a gathered crowd, to the side of your seat is one of your courtiers. "We've received evidence of your proclivities, the whole realm knows."
[surrogated_kid.GetFirstName] has been born and it's time to introduce [surrogated_kid.GetHerHim] to your spouse.
